title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\OSPolicyAssignment\Rollout
name: Rollout
description:
Message to configure the rollout at the zonal level for the OS policy assignment.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.OSPolicyAssignment.Rollout

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.disruption_budget
params.description: Required. The maximum number (or percentage) of VMs per zone to disrupt at any given moment.

params.name: data.min_wait_duration
params.description: Required. This determines the minimum duration of time to wait after the configuration changes are applied through the current rollout. A VM continues to count towards the disruption_budget at least until this duration of time has passed after configuration changes are applied.
